alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:58PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Churchill County through 415 PM PDT... At 358 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middlegate, or 30 miles north of Gabbs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlegate, Junction U.S 50 And Nv 121 (Dixie Valley Rd), Junction U.S 50 And NV 839, Sand Mountain Campground, Frenchman, Junction U.S 50 And NV 722 and Sand Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
